thread.title: BRIEF-Krung Thai Bank Says FY Net Profit Attributable 22.45 Bln Baht Versus 32.30 Bln Baht

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Krung Thai Bank Says FY Net Profit Attributable 22.45 Bln Baht Versus 32.30 Bln Baht

organizations.name: brief-krung thai bank says fy net profit attributable

text:
Jan 22 (Reuters) - Krung Thai Bank Pcl:
* FY NET PROFIT ATTRIBUTABLE 22.45 BILLION BAHT VERSUS 32.30 BILLION BAHT
* FY NET INTEREST INCOME 85.78 BILLION BAHT VERSUS 86.97 BILLION BAHT
* AS OF DEC. 31, 2017, BANKâ€™S COMMON EQUITY TIER 1 & TIER I CAPITAL WAS 13.59 PERCENT OF ITS RISK-WEIGHTED ASSETS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (bangalore.newsroom@thomsonreuters.com)
